type.name: org.gradle.api.logging.LoggingOutput
type.description: Provides access to the output of the Gradle logging system.

method.name: addStandardErrorListener
method.description:
Adds a listener which receives output written to standard error by the Gradle logging system.
param:listener The listener to add.

method.name: addStandardOutputListener
method.description:
Adds a listener which receives output written to standard output by the Gradle logging system.
param:listener The listener to add.

method.name: removeStandardErrorListener
method.description:
Removes a listener from standard error.
param:listener The listener to remove.

method.name: removeStandardOutputListener
method.description:
Removes a listener from standard output.
param:listener The listener to remove.
